definition: Caesar (name)/Gaius Julius Caesar 100-42 BC/by extension, emperor, Kaiser, Tsar
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
Julius Caesar, 1599 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚

sentences.english: Caesar was the general of Rome.
sentences.chinese: 恺撒是罗马的盖世将军。

sentences.english: Romeo & Juliet, Julius Caesar, The Merchant of Venice.
sentences.chinese: 罗密欧与朱丽叶，恺撒大帝，威尼斯商人。

sentences.english: Gasser was the master of Rome.
sentences.chinese: 恺撒于是成了罗马的主宰。

sentences.english: Well I believe in God, and the only thing that scares me is Keyser Soze.
sentences.chinese: 不外我信，但这世上唯一让我恐惊的是恺撒苏尔。

sentences.english: Caesar marched north into the forests that border the Danube River.
sentences.chinese: 恺撒挥师北上，深入到多瑙河沿岸的森林地带。

sentences.english: Julius also, then, set himself up in the city, when he started gaining more power in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 恺撒在罗马势力日渐壮大后，成为了独裁官。

sentences.english: Julius Caesar wore a laurel wreath to cover the onset of baldness.
sentences.chinese: 恺撒大帝带月桂花环以遮掩自己日益稀少的头发。

sentences.english: Caesars Palace plays an important part in hotel industry.
sentences.chinese: 恺撒皇宫在同行业中地位举足轻重。

sentences.english: Julius Caesar was ravished by Cleopatra's beauty.
sentences.chinese: 克娄巴特拉的美貌使恺撒一见倾心。

sentences.english: He had superiority in cavalry, both he and Ceasar knew that.
sentences.chinese: 庞培有骑兵优势，他和恺撒都明白这一点。

sentences.english: Brutus and Cassius joined in the conspiracy to kill Julius Caesar.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁特斯和卡加入了阴谋杀害恺撒大帝。

sentences.english: I’d like to add an order of Caesar salad.
Julius Caesar has been called the most unmatched military general in Roman history.
sentences.chinese: 恺撒大帝被称为罗马历史上空前绝后的军事领袖。

definition: Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
